course_description: This course focuses on the relationships among sequence, structure, and function of macromolecules focusing on the practical aspects of macromolecular synthesis, structural and functional characterization, and degradation. Students who withdraw from the lecture must withdraw from the corequisite laboratory course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry department approval.
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 203 & CHEM_OX 203L prerequisites & CHEM 204L co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 204L first, then CHEM_OX 204. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
